      • ThreePid

        public ThreePid(java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                java.lang.String country,
                java.lang.String medium)
        Build a ThreePid with the given phone number and country (MEDIUM_MSISDN)
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number (national or international format)
        country - country code of the phone number (can be empty if phone number has international format and starts by "+")
        medium - the identifier medium, MEDIUM_MSISDN in that case

    • Method Detail

      • requestEmailValidationToken

        public void requestEmailValidationToken(ProfileRestClient restClient,
                                        java.lang.String nextLink,
                                        boolean isDuringRegistration,
                                        ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Request an email validation token.
        Parameters:
        restClient - the rest client to use.
        nextLink - the nextLink
        isDuringRegistration - true if it is added during a registration
        callback - the callback when the operation is done

      • requestPhoneNumberValidationToken

        public void requestPhoneNumberValidationToken(ProfileRestClient restClient,
                                              boolean isDuringRegistration,
                                              ApiCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Request a phone number validation token.
        Parameters:
        restClient - the rest client to use.
        isDuringRegistration - true if it is added during a registration
        callback - the callback when the operation is done

      • submitValidationToken

        public void submitValidationToken(ThirdPidRestClient restClient,
                                  java.lang.String token,
                                  java.lang.String clientSecret,
                                  java.lang.String sid,
                                  ApiCallback<java.lang.Boolean> respCallback)
        Request the ownership validation of an email address or a phone number previously set by requestEmailValidationToken(ProfileRestClient, String, boolean, ApiCallback)
        Parameters:
        restClient - REST client
        token - the token generated by the requestEmailValidationToken or requestPhoneNumberValidationToken call
        clientSecret - the client secret which was supplied in the requestEmailValidationToken or requestPhoneNumberValidationToken call
        sid - the sid for the session
        respCallback - asynchronous callback response
